alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:00PM CDT until June 05 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Leake County in central Mississippi... South central Attala County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomastown, or 14 miles northwest of Carthage, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Camden around 345 PM CDT. Cameron around 350 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
